mapper.select: SELECT distinct td.ticket_id, td.city_id, td.ticket_name, td.ticket_child_price, td.ticket_due_date, ti.ticket_rep_img_path, ti.ticket_detail_img_path, ct.city_name, (SELECT FORMAT( IFNULL(AVG(r.rv_rating), 0), 1) FROM review r WHERE r.rv_real_id = td.ticket_id ) AS ticket_score FROM ticket_detail td LEFT JOIN ticket_img ti ON td.ticket_id = ti.ticket_id LEFT JOIN city ct ON td.city_id = ct.city_id

SELECT distinct td.*, date_format(td.ticket_due_date, '%Y.%m.%d') AS ticket_due_date, td.ticket_adult_price, td.ticket_child_price, ti.ticket_rep_img_path, ti.ticket_detail_img_path, ct.city_name, (SELECT FORMAT( IFNULL(AVG(r.rv_rating), 0), 1) FROM review r WHERE r.rv_real_id = td.ticket_id ) AS ticket_score FROM ticket_detail td LEFT JOIN ticket_img ti ON td.ticket_id = ti.ticket_id LEFT JOIN city ct ON td.city_id = ct.city_id WHERE td.ticket_id = #{ticket_id}
